# tlShiny

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tlShiny is to provide useful functions for Teaching Lab Shiny dashboards

## Installation

You can install the development version of tlShiny from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("teachinglab/tlShiny")
```
